home.subtitle: Interactive Media Designer | Digital Communication Specialist

about.title: About me
about.description: I am Katherine Reyes, a 10th-semester Interactive Media Design student and 8th-semester Communication student with a digital focus at Universidad Icesi. I am passionate about graphic design, creating visual content, and managing digital projects. Throughout my education, I have gained experience in UX/UI design, multimedia production, social media management, and project coordination, participating in both academic environments and freelance initiatives. My approach combines aesthetics and functionality to develop innovative visual solutions that communicate effectively. I consider myself a creative, organized, and proactive person, with technical skills in tools such as Adobe Creative Suite and Figma, as well as in creating social media content and executing digital strategies.
